title: Out-of-proc build tests hang in .NET Core
body: For example, try running `Microsoft.Build.UnitTests.BackEnd.BuildManager_Tests.SimpleBuildOutOfProcess()` in the Debug-NetCore configuration. It hangs on `BuildSubmission.Execute` waiting on a `_completionEvent` that never comes.

nodes.body: Dragging this forward because I suspect it's related to #651.
